For members of Benfleet, Essex, to feel safe and secure in their own community. Furthermore mitigate potential gang related crimes.
We should not have to be subjected to this type of behaviour and thus lead to our property and lives being put at risk.
attributes.background:
On October 31st 2021 a group of masked people threw fireworks at: property, people and cars, leading residents feeling threatened and unsafe.

We want: 

1. Police patrols, in affected areas, and regular stop and search.

2. Banning the sale of fireworks, unless for Official Licensed displays.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make fireworks illegal to buy, with the exception of public displays: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591501

Decisions about local policing are a matter for individual police forces, not the Government or Parliament.

If you want to report a crime you should contact the police: https://www.police.uk/pu/contact-the-police/report-a-crime-incident/
